editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Energy Drink is appreciated worldwide by top athletes, busy professionals, university students and travellers on long journeys

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Red Bull Sugarfree is Red Bull Energy Drink without sugar

editions.name: The Blue Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Sea Blue Edition with the extraordinary taste of Juneberry artificially flavoured

editions.name: The Summer Edition
editions.flavor_description: Wings for your summer: The Red Bull Summer Edition Energy Drink with the taste of White Peach, a touch of citrus peel and floral notes
